body: The primary election scheduled for Sept. 11 but postponed because of the terrorist attack will be held today. title: Vallone Maps Victory Route Through Giuliani Territory

body: When the long-troubled John Jay High School in Park Slope, Brooklyn, closed its doors for good a week ago today, the goodbyes were tinged with a mix of emotions. title: Reinventing John Jay High Amid Charges of Exclusion

title: Not Dodgers II, but It's Baseball; The Game Is Back in Brooklyn, on a Smaller Scale

body: A FAMILIAR green image of a mermaid stands on Van Brunt Street in Red Hook, Brooklyn, near the corner of Coffey Street. ''Coming Soon,'' the sign says, ''Starbucks Coffey.'' title: If You're Thinking of Living In/Red Hook; Isolated Brooklyn Area Starts to Awaken

body: To the Editor: What can a writer do when New York, with its din and oppressive rents, is home? title: Signs of Literary Life
